trends: There have been no other sightings in johannesburg
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving down bear lake drive by two lakes,while a storm was just brewing.lots of lighting with the sun was still out,going south.right in the storm clouds and lighting,very brightly lit from the sun.A very long straight,black object caught my attention.i stopped the van to get out,for a better look...as did several other cars.about 10-15 people just stared with the wonder i was seeing and feeling.As far as we could see this jet black object,i'd say 5-maybe25 miles long,straight as an arrow.I really cant't say it was a solid object,it appeared like a huge split in the storm clouds and i could see the blackness of outer-space,very clearly with storm clouds and lightning all around,not any of the storm interfering with the split in the sky.My heart was pounding,thinking it was the end of the world.This object or split was huge,people must be able to see it for miles,as far as we all could see it,straight,black,perhapsa hundred miles or more,i could see no end.I stared at the blackness,and thought i should be able to see some stars through this splitting of the atmosphere,but saw only blackness.Now I choked some words out to the man closest to me"Maybe it's the end,the old man might be coming down.He said,Yeah...maybe...maybe you're right.By this time 10-15 cars had pulled over to look in awe.Iwas thinking of what i was going to say to God of a confession of my past bad doings,you've got to understand how powerful this split or object was.It seemed everyone should be able to see it.Straight black looking like it might even circle the earth...as faras i could see...north to south.After 10 minutes the storm clouds started to fill it in,and now for the first time it looked like a solid object as the storm clouds swirled around it,like it was lifting up away from earth,the clouds showed edges as more clouds looked like they are being sucked across the black surface...as it slowly liftedup and away.Now some 20-30 people watched as it pulled the storm clouds across it till it was gone.We shrugged our shoulders and everyone left to go home to tell others of the massive black object,and no one believed anything i told them,but the people there know,and wonder.
Summary: black...5-25 miles long...straight across the sky
